name: thaw-ta-math
description: Financial technical analysis library in TypeScript. Calculates indicators amd overlays from OHLCV data.

directories.// bin: It is an error to specify both bin and directories.bin
directories.// doc: Put markdown files in the directories.doc directory

scripts.all: npm run travis && npm pack && npm run deploy
scripts.rebuild-offline: npm run clean-offline && npm run build-and-test
scripts.rebuild-online: npm run clean-online && npm i && npm run build-and-test
scripts.clean-online: npm run clean-offline && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.build-and-test: npm run prettiercheck && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run prettiercheck && npm test
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run prettiercheck
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src
scripts.re: npm run format && npm run clean-offline && npm run build-and-test && npm pack && npm run deploy
scripts.loc: git ls-files | grep -v package-lock.json | tr -d '\r' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 wc -l
scripts.f: npm run format && npm run all

// bundledDependencies: ... is an array of package names
author: Tom Weatherhead <thaw@2hrd4u.org> (https://github.com/tom-weatherhead)
